DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multicenter study evaluate performance Osseotite Prevail implant support short fix bridge immediate occlusal loading , provide patient use temporary prosthesis final prosthesis make . Study ( null ) hypothesis : This observational study concurrent control group observe . Results study compare performance Osseotite implant publish Osseotite multicenter study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Osseotite Certain Prevail Implants Used Support Short Fixed Bridges With Immediate Occlusal Loading .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational study patient implant place provisional prosthesis attach within 24 hour implant surgery . Each restorative case consist posterior short span fix bridge four implant less . The final prosthesis place within five month implant placement surgery . Overall success determine basis procedural success , prosthesis success , implant success .
